mapper.insert: insert into IPO_SPECIAL_POUNDAGE (POUNDAGE_ID, DEALER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, POUNDAGE_ALGR, MODIFY_DATE, REGISTER_RATIO, CANCEL_RATIO, SAIL_RATIO) values (#{poundageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poundageAlgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{registerRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cancelRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sailRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update IPO_SPECIAL_POUNDAGE set DEALER_ID = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_ID = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POUNDAGE_ALGR = #{poundageAlgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REGISTER_RATIO = #{registerRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANCEL_RATIO = #{cancelRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SAIL_RATIO = #{sailRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where POUNDAGE_ID = #{poundageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select POUNDAGE_ID, DEALER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, POUNDAGE_ALGR, MODIFY_DATE, REGISTER_RATIO, CANCEL_RATIO, SAIL_RATIO from IPO_SPECIAL_POUNDAGE where POUNDAGE_ID = #{poundageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select POUNDAGE_ID, DEALER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, POUNDAGE_ALGR, MODIFY_DATE, REGISTER_RATIO, CANCEL_RATIO, SAIL_RATIO from IPO_SPECIAL_POUNDAGE
